meanings.definition: Fermentation caused by the action of enzymes.
meanings.sent1: The zymosis in the bread dough made it rise.
meanings.sent2: The brewery used zymosis to turn the barley into beer.
meanings.sent3: The zymosis in the yogurt seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The zymosis of creativity spread through the artist's mind.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of zymosis filled the air as the grapes turned into wine.

meanings.sent1: The zymosis of the pickles gave them their tangy flavor.
meanings.sent2: The winemaker carefully monitored the zymosis of the grape juice.
meanings.sent3: The zymosis in the compost bin was like a tiny party for microbes.
meanings.sent4: The zymosis of change slowly transformed the old building into a new one.
meanings.sent5: The bubbling zymosis in the cider indicated that it was ready to drink.

meanings.sent1: The doctor identified the zymosis quickly and started treatment.
meanings.sent2: The village was quarantined due to an outbreak of zymosis.
meanings.sent3: The zymosis spreading through the school was just a rumor after all.
meanings.sent4: The zymosis of gossip seemed to infect everyone in the office.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds of zymosis loomed over the town, causing fear among the residents.
